list_definition.definition: (the charms, spells etc used in) the art or practice of using supernatural forces

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The prince was turned by magic into a frog.

list_definition.definition: the art of producing illusions by tricks

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The conjuror’s magic delighted the children.
